Title: Bill Sussman
Plot: After going AWOL from the military Andy turns up in camouflage. The city council works with Sullivan. Shane goes to summer school in Majestic. Nancy's involvement with U-Turn becomes more entrenched and Silas has business ideas. Sullivan asks Nancy to hold a cocktail party.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Patricia Harris Smith, Richard Hilton, Sathya Jesudasson, Rick Scarry, Fatso Fasano, Indigo, Wendle Josepher, Page Kennedy, Maulik Pancholy, Steve Tom
